long_description: The 60 in. Wasatch Powder Monkeys SwitchBlade Crossbars allow you to quickly change out rack attachments so you spend less time fussing with your roof rack and more time playing in the outdoors. Quick-release system enables you to easily slide any attachment such as ski racks, bike racks, or cargo boxes on and off your roof rack in seconds, without the use of tools. Hard-anodized 6065 aluminum is machined for precision, strength and durability. True airfoil design is aerodynamic for improved gas mileage and reduced wind noise. Wasatch Powder Monkeys Adaptor Kits (not included) make most existing bike racks, cargo boxes, ski racks, or boat mounts compatible with the SwitchBlade system. Switchblade Crossbars are designed to fit towers made for round Yakima or square Thule crossbars.
short_description: The 60 in. Wasatch Powder Monkeys SwitchBlade Crossbars allow you to quickly change out rack attachments so you spend less time fussing with your roof rack and more time playing in the outdoors.
